node.description:
[Website](http://www.kaoru-wada.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoru_wadash) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/4zbQfESCpBlXi1XlpnlG95)

He is a Japanese music composer. Married to voice actress [Akiko Nakagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/95749/Akiko-Nakagawa).

An italian actor, voice actor, ADR director and dialogue writer, mostly known for his roles as [Piccolo Jr.](https://anilist.co/character/914/) and [All For One](https://anilist.co/character/125956/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/吉原俊一郎)

Affiliated with studio Bihou.
__Tomoki Nagasaka__ is a Japanese editor who works for post production studio Jay Film.
